name: Arsenal (FabioMellone)
description:
PICK UP AND SHOOT

Arsenal is an over the top twin-stick shooter focused on weapons. 

As a badass, full of anger dude, you have to kill everyone standing in your way, exploiting some bizarre weapons.

Each piece of the arsenal has limited ammo, so, along with the massacre, you have constantly to look for some new ones.

Be fast, be deadly, kill them all!

FEATURES
  • 12 different weapons to discover: from the classic ones (like an assault rifle and a shotgun) to some crazy ones (what about shooting tornadoes?)
  • 10 types of enemies, each coming with its own pattern
  • A lot of blood and explosions cause every good game needs those.

The game is an early prototype, showing the core of the experience and a taste of the art style.
